Extra Lemon Dill

add even more lemon flavor with the zest of 1 lemon and be sure to use lemon juice (not vinegar in the recipe). You could also use lemon-flavored yogurt (which will be strong, but wonderful if that is what you are looking for)/ Adding Â¼ tsp of sumac if you have it in your pantry (a lemony flavored spice) would be interesting too.
